segment.source: Configure Logging and Tracing
segment.target: Configure Logging and Tracing

segment.source: Configure Logging and Tracing
segment.target: Configure Logging and Tracing

segment.source: Configure Logging and Tracing
segment.target: Configure Logging and Tracing

segment.source: You can centrally configure optional logging and tracing using Administrative templates.
segment.target: You can centrally configure optional logging and tracing using Administrative templates.

segment.source: This may be helpful when diagnosing any problems related to Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM).
segment.target: This may be helpful when diagnosing any problems related to Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM).

segment.source: A user account with the AGPM Administrator (Full Control) role, the user account of the Approver who created the Group Policy Object (GPO) used in these procedures, or a user account with the necessary permissions in AGPM is required to complete these procedures.
segment.target: A user account with the AGPM Administrator (Full Control) role, the user account of the Approver who created the Group Policy Object (GPO) used in these procedures, or a user account with the necessary permissions in AGPM is required to complete these procedures.

segment.source: Additionally, a user account with access to the AGPM Server is required to initiate logging on the AGPM Server.
segment.target: Additionally, a user account with access to the AGPM Server is required to initiate logging on the AGPM Server.

segment.source: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.
segment.target: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.

segment.source: To configure logging and tracing for AGPM
segment.target: To configure logging and tracing for AGPM

segment.source: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, edit a GPO that is applied to all Group Policy administrators for which you want to turn on logging and tracing.
segment.target: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, edit a GPO that is applied to all Group Policy administrators for which you want to turn on logging and tracing.

segment.source: (For more information, see Editing a GPO.)
segment.target: (For more information, see Editing a GPO.)

segment.source: In the Group Policy Management Editor window, click Computer Configuration, Policies, Administrative Templates, Windows Components, and AGPM.
segment.target: In the Group Policy Management Editor window, click Computer Configuration, Policies, Administrative Templates, Windows Components, and AGPM.

segment.source: In the details pane, double-click AGPM: Configure logging.
segment.target: In the details pane, double-click AGPM: Configure logging.

segment.source: In the Properties window, click Enabled, and configure the level of detail to record in the logs.
segment.target: In the Properties window, click Enabled, and configure the level of detail to record in the logs.

segment.source: Click OK.
segment.target: Click OK.

segment.source: Close the Group Policy Management Editor window.
segment.target: Close the Group Policy Management Editor window.

segment.source: (For more information, see Deploy a GPO.) After Group Policy is updated, you must restart the AGPM Service to start, modify, or stop logging on the AGPM Server.
segment.target: (For more information, see Deploy a GPO.) After Group Policy is updated, you must restart the AGPM Service to start, modify, or stop logging on the AGPM Server.

segment.source: Group Policy administrators must close and restart the GPMC to start, modify, or stop logging on their computers.
segment.target: Group Policy administrators must close and restart the GPMC to start, modify, or stop logging on their computers.

segment.source: Trace file locations:
segment.target: Trace file locations:

segment.source: Client: %LocalAppData%MicrosoftAGPMagpm.log
segment.target: Client: %LocalAppData%MicrosoftAGPMagpm.log

segment.source: Server: %ProgramData%MicrosoftAGPMagpmserv.log
segment.target: Server: %ProgramData%MicrosoftAGPMagpmserv.log

segment.source: Additional considerations
segment.target: Additional considerations

segment.source: You must be able to edit and deploy a GPO to configure AGPM logging and tracing.
segment.target: You must be able to edit and deploy a GPO to configure AGPM logging and tracing.

segment.source: See Editing a GPO and Deploy a GPO for additional detail.
segment.target: See Editing a GPO and Deploy a GPO for additional detail.

segment.source: Additional references
segment.target: Additional references

segment.source: Configuring Advanced Group Policy Management
segment.target: Configuring Advanced Group Policy Management
